entry.tran: 跟踪骚扰者(尤针对名人或分手恋人)
entry.def: A stalker is someone who keeps following or contacting someone else, especially a famous person or a person they used to have a relationship with, in an annoying and frightening way.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who walks with long stiff strides
3. someone who prowls or sneaks about; usually with unlawful intentions
